meta.name: description
meta.content: Jen is a high-level bytecode transformation and generation library with an API based on classes, methods and fields.

section.name: Language-centric bytecode generation
section.p: Jen is a fast, lightweight, and easy to use Java(tm) classworking and bytecode manipulation library that provides a small (under 40k) language-centric core API permitting easy modification of existing Java classes, generation of completely new ones from scratch or to spec, and supporting many advanced capabilities such as platform-compatible and custom-strategy proxies, dynamic constraints-based implementations (often referred to as mocks), and a complete runtime classworking toolkit.
Please see the Introduction for more information.
